price: 53. Et lorsque Nous avons donné à Moïse le Livre et le Discernement (Al-Furqân) afin que vous soyez guidés (vers la juste voie).
arabic: وَإِذۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba wal-fur'qāna laʿallakum tahtadūna
